Question: In ****'s original view, what really happened to a person (the "actual") determined the resulting neurotic disposition.
Hints: Three days after his death, this person's body was cremated at the Golders Green Crematorium in North London.
As a medical researcher, this person was an early user and proponent of cocaine as a stimulant as well as analgesic.
Reich saw this person's importance for psychiatry as parallel to that of Marx for economics.
